name: Stable Inc.
description:
In your new job working in an unstable nuclear power plant, you will need to review the manual often... 

Find it here: (Ctrl+Click)  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Kcs95a22Lpcqg1sNQbby1KrHJ-5boYVj/view?usp=shari...

You can use ESC to access options during the game.
